function isValidUrl(url) {

return false;

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

Outdoor Faucet Covers for Winter, 2 PCS 6″Wx 9″H Reusable Outside Faucet Insulated Cover Socks, Freeze Protection Garden Hose Cover Socks for Wall Taps Outside
【High Compatibility】 Faucet cover measures 9in x 6in, 2.3 inch thick. It is about 1-2 inch larger and 1inch thicker than most of other faucet socks. Works well with various faucet types, such as garden spigots, hose bibs, water tap, keep faucets protected in freezing weather.
【Quick & Easy Installtion 】 The faucet socks with Velcro straps are easy to put on and take off even you wear gloves in cold winter. Simply pull the cover over the faucet/tap and fasten it tightly with the Velcro strap. A few seconds is all it takes!
【Superior Protection】 Very thick faucet cover design. In winter protecting your outside faucets from freezing and bursting. In summer prevent faucets from the blazing sun or the rust. Help save costly repairs. It has the functions of antifreeze, rainproof, snowproof, sun exposure, windproof and dust prevention.
【Super Waterproof & Insulation】The water faucet cover for winter is constructed of 3 layers – 210D oxford cloth waterproof coating thicker insulated silk cotton 190t taffeta waterproof coating, making it durable and reusable season after season. effectively keep the faucet dry and warm during.
【Please Confirm Again】You will receive 2 pack faucet protective covers. Please measure the size before purchase,If you don’t know the size of your faucet, you can try to buy. It works well with various faucet types. If you have any questions, please contact us in time. We will reply within 24 hours.

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

From the brand

DaFang is committed to developing and designing organizer and storage clean tools products, included broom rack and mop holder. Save your home space and make your life more easy.

IMILLET Broom Organizer

Tidy Your Home: 5 ball slots and 6 hooks design, organize your annoying cleaning tools within small space.
Spring Loaded: Special spring clips design with rolling rubber ball that make sure the broom and mop will not fall out,including wet mop, dirty rakes, stick vacuum and other heavy stuff
Wide Compatible To Everywhere: Apply to your garage, garden, kitchen, laundry, offices and more. It is strong and sturdy. Keep solid on the wall with the slots and screws (Included). It can organize most of tools of your home.
Heavy Duty: Mop holder grip everything tightly and securely. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total. Made of high quality ABS and slots and screws.We upgraded our products after 2018 July 1st, and we improved the quality of this products that are easy-to-drop. Now the products can grip everything tightly and securely.
Easy Install: Wall mounted, detailed installation steps on the package. Easy to install with slots and screws (included).

  • There are 5 ball slots and 6 hooks so you can organize as much cleaning utilities, organizer designed to hold various household objects with handles of varying thickness, Hooks can be folded up and out of the way.
  • Simply insert a handle into a slot and a rounded, spring loaded, rolling ball automatically adjusts to the handle’s thickness and grips it securely, Easy release by lifting the handle.
  • Fast and Easy to install, 6 screws to hold the wall mount organizer to ensure strong and sturdy holding. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total.

Read more

Upgrade Broom Rack

Space Saver

Imillet broom holder can keep your broom, closet, kitchen, garage, garden, bathroom, or laundry room in organized. Also suitable for garden and yard tools racks storage and organize.

5 Slots 6 Hooks

5 postions can hold up mop, broom, dustpan, shovel, small vacuum, small garden tools and others.6 foldable hooks are great for rags, bristle brushes, swifters, fly swatter and other small tools.

Product Description

NEWNEN COB 18 LEDs Outdoor Solar Spot Lights

Not only does a NEWNEN LED spotlight functions as a source to light at night, it can also create a touch of luxury to your property, highlight a few important structures that you want to emphasize, as well as bring a feel of mystery and romance to the surrounding areas. More importantly, they will save you a lot of money on the electricity bill by charging up fully during the day and lighting after dusk.

Warm tips:

Please confirm the switch is under “on” status so that the light could be charged normally and auto lights on at night.(Cover the solar panel in the daytime or go to the dark environment for testing.)Please make sure that the light’s photocell is not affected by other light sources at night.The brightness and duration of solar lights will be different because it is affected by the climate, seasons, geographical location and other factors.The solar spotlights may need more time (at least 6-8 hours) to be fully charged in the rainy, snowy cloudy weather.

Turn on or off automatically at the right time

Modern light sensor to operate automatically

Dusk-to-Dawn Solar Powered Outdoor Light

It cones with two brightness levels, high light mode that last for 6 hours and low light mode that lasts for 10 hours

High Light Mode:Long press for 3-5 seconds, the spotlight will automatically light up High light mode at night.Low Light Mode:Press again, the spotlight will automatically light up Low light mode at night.

Note: Please make sure to turn on the switch before charge the solar light during the day.

Includes an adjustable, powerful solar panel and spot light,Effective and quick in transform sunlightEmits a bright light, covering a large area and more focused

Wide Applications:

Pathway Lighting

solar light for flag pole

Wall mount garage lighting

Garden Lighting

Solar landscape spotlights are increasingly becoming a popular choice over the past few years because of raising awareness of renewable energy. These small yet advanced units would be a great addition to your beautiful garden or backyard thanks to modern and futuristic designs.

The solar spot lights outdoor give just the right glow to brighten all the plants and make it beautiful at night. The 2 settings of High and Low light are perfect for creating the right mood for your front yard

It can be used not only as a lawn light, but also as a wall light .if you like outdoor sports. use it as a camping light or a flashlight.

Pros：

Easy to install without the wiring tasksCompletely powered and run by the sunConstructed from durable and weather-proof ABS plasticModern and simple designLong-lasting operation and quick rechargIP67 waterproof performance makes it ideal to use under all weather conditions

NOTE:

In order to maximize the lighting effect, please make sure that the solar landscape spotlight is full of sunlight electricity.Please install the solar lights in the place where the sun can directly shine, and make sure there is no shelter above the solar panel, such as eaves and trees.The default mode of the product is Off mode. Press power button to turn on modes when using the product.It is recommended to turn off the light and charge it under direct sunlight for 1-2 days before the first use. make sure the product has enough power.During the installation, please make sure the landscape light is installed under direct sunlight where there is no shade or eave to shelter the solar panel. Otherwise, the lighting time will be shorter.if the lighting time shortens after the product has worked for a period, check whether the solar panel is covered with dusts and clean it regularly.Please make sure to turn on the switch before use.

LED Beads 18 LEDs Brightness 150-250 lumen Beam Angle 90 degrees Waterproof Rating IP67 Color Temperature 6000-6500K Solar Batteries #18650 Working Temperature -10°~45°

More Uniform and More Focused: adopting the unique design of the reflector of the water trough complemented by advanced 19 cob-led lamp beads, the solar spotlights outdoor waterproof can emit a more concentrated and uniform beam of light without glare
2 Brightness Levels: Low light mode (10Hrs) / High light mode (7Hrs). With ultra brightness and focus, the solar outdoor lights provides full illumination to your patio or driveway. With a focused beam of light, you can point the solar flag pole light to light any place and draw lots of attention to your garden, flag, or backyard
Suitable for Extreme Complex Weather: The solar lights adopt IP68 waterproof technology and anti-ultraviolet ABS material for durability. The outdoor solar lights for yard can withstand all kinds of bad weather even in heavy rain, high temperature, and heavy snow
Versatile and Easy to Install: the solar spot lights outdoor can be used as solar landscape lights with the light stake inserted into the ground to highlight trees, sculptures, flags, etc; or screwed to a wall or pillar for illumination, to light up a porch, pathway, driveway garden, etc


NEWNEN COB 18 LEDs Outdoor Solar Spot Lights

Not only does a NEWNEN LED spotlight functions as a source to light at night, it can also create a touch of luxury to your property, highlight a few important structures that you want to emphasize, as well as bring a feel of mystery and romance to the surrounding areas. More importantly, they will save you a lot of money on the electricity bill by charging up fully during the day and lighting after dusk.

Warm tips:

  • Please confirm the switch is under “on” status so that the light could be charged normally and auto lights on at night.(Cover the solar panel in the daytime or go to the dark environment for testing.)
  • Please make sure that the light’s photocell is not affected by other light sources at night.
  • The brightness and duration of solar lights will be different because it is affected by the climate, seasons, geographical location and other factors.
  • The solar spotlights may need more time (at least 6-8 hours) to be fully charged in the rainy, snowy cloudy weather.

  • Turn on or off automatically at the right time

Modern light sensor to operate automatically

Dusk-to-Dawn Solar Powered Outdoor Light

  • It cones with two brightness levels, high light mode that last for 6 hours and low light mode that lasts for 10 hours

  1. High Light Mode:Long press for 3-5 seconds, the spotlight will automatically light up High light mode at night.
  2. Low Light Mode:Press again, the spotlight will automatically light up Low light mode at night.

Note: Please make sure to turn on the switch before charge the solar light during the day.

  • Includes an adjustable, powerful solar panel and spot light,Effective and quick in transform sunlight
  • Emits a bright light, covering a large area and more focused

Wide Applications:

Pathway Lighting

solar light for flag pole

Wall mount garage lighting

Garden Lighting

Read more

Solar landscape spotlights are increasingly becoming a popular choice over the past few years because of raising awareness of renewable energy. These small yet advanced units would be a great addition to your beautiful garden or backyard thanks to modern and futuristic designs.

The solar spot lights outdoor give just the right glow to brighten all the plants and make it beautiful at night. The 2 settings of High and Low light are perfect for creating the right mood for your front yard

It can be used not only as a lawn light, but also as a wall light .if you like outdoor sports. use it as a camping light or a flashlight.

Pros：

  • Easy to install without the wiring tasks
  • Completely powered and run by the sun
  • Constructed from durable and weather-proof ABS plastic
  • Modern and simple design
  • Long-lasting operation and quick recharg
  • IP67 waterproof performance makes it ideal to use under all weather conditions

NOTE:

  1. In order to maximize the lighting effect, please make sure that the solar landscape spotlight is full of sunlight electricity.
  2. Please install the solar lights in the place where the sun can directly shine, and make sure there is no shelter above the solar panel, such as eaves and trees.
  3. The default mode of the product is Off mode. Press power button to turn on modes when using the product.
  4. It is recommended to turn off the light and charge it under direct sunlight for 1-2 days before the first use. make sure the product has enough power.
  5. During the installation, please make sure the landscape light is installed under direct sunlight where there is no shade or eave to shelter the solar panel. Otherwise, the lighting time will be shorter.
  6. if the lighting time shortens after the product has worked for a period, check whether the solar panel is covered with dusts and clean it regularly.
  7. Please make sure to turn on the switch before use.

Waterproof Rating IP67
Color Temperature 6000-6500K
Solar Batteries #18650

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {

var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);

var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,

From the brand

KERNOWO LED LIGHTS

All lights what you need

KERNOWO is a professional brand company focusing on home indoor lighting and outdoor lighting.

We are committed to providing customers with high-quality products that are convenient and energy-saving.

You will find many types LED lights you want.

Solar Lights with Remote

106 Solar Lights Outdoor with Independent Solar Panel 2 Pack

Solar Lights Outdoor

Super bright outside solar flood light, perfect for your outdoor use.

KERNOWO led lights

【Four Modes Adjustable】Four adjustable modes by pressing the button on the back of the solar outdoor light and the remote. Mode 1: Auto on at night, and motion sensor off. Mode 2: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and low light after people leave. Mode 3: Strong light of 15s when motion is detected, and turn off after people leave. Mode 4: Light fashes at night.
【Flexible Use】The solar panel of the solar led lights can be placed independently of the light body, and connected by a 16.5 ft wire to ensure maximum charging. Aslo you can put them together.
【Super Bright Light Beads】Equiped with 106 LED high light beads and an illumination of 180° wide, the solar lights outdoor can provide 500sq.ft and 3000LM lighting. 3000mAh lithium battery has a larger capacity to provide more efficient charging and more lasting lighting.
【Weatherproof & Durable】Built with IP65 Waterproof,the solar panel lights outdoor body is sturdy enough and the wire connection is sealed.It still works well in rainy and cold days and hot summer.




Specification:

  • Quantity: 2 Pack
  • LED Beads: 106 Pcs
  • Brightness: 3000LM
  • Battery Capacity: 3000mAh
  • Material: ABS+PC
  • Waterproof Level: IP65

Solar Wall Lights Outdoor

luces solares para exteriores

1.106 LED 3000LM light gives you super brightness.

2.Independent solar panel gives you more flexible installation.

3.With remote included, you can control the light more conveniently.

4.IP65 waterproof design makes it withstand bad wheather for more durability.

Read more




Large Lighting and Sensoring Range

Solar Motion Sensor Light has 180° wide lighting angle.And large sensoring range of 26.2ft and 120° sensoring angle make you not lose your steps in the dark.

IP65 Waterproof

With IP65 waterproof , solar wall light can be outdoor used. No worry about rainy and cold days.

135° Rotatable Light Head

The light head and solar panel can be 135° adjusted,which means it can charge more effectively and cover more range.

Product Description

Lzeodo

The Lzeodo is an enterprise specializing in the production and selling of power tools holder. We are committed to providing excellent products and services. Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this power tools storage. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours.

LZEODO POWER TOOL ORGANIZER

SPECIFICATIONS

Drill Organizer Rack*1

Wrench *1

Screws *12

Screws Nut *12

Screwdriver Holder *2

Expansion Nails Plug *3

Expansion Nails *2

The upper layer used to storage tools and hand drills. The middle layer is for charging stations, battery, tool box etc. The 4 drill hanging slots are for power drills, saws etc. The side racks are for pliers and hammers.

Screwdriver Organizer

There are more than 10 holes in the tool rack, which can store screwdrivers of different sizes. Very convenient for your access.

Easy to Assemble

Just need to connect the gauge steel wire and plating with screws and hang it on the wall according to the instructions.

4 Drill Holders

Friendly design with 4 drill holders. It can store cordless drills, brush less drills,small corded drills,impact driver drills.

MADE FOR MOST TOOL ORGANIZATION: This tool organizer adopts unique multifunctional storage design with 15 holes for screwdrivers holder, 4 racks for pliers storage and two flat shelves to place other power tools. This tool storage helps you keep all your commonly used project tools neatly organized and within your arm’s reach.
THICKEN HEAVY-DUTY MATERIAL: Compared with other utility racks which made of thin wire, our drill holder has greater bearing capacity. It is made of thicken heavy compact steel metal, and the joint of the shelf uses a reinforced design. This shelf is strong enough to withstand a person of 50kgs.
REMOVABLE AND EASY TO INSTALL: The power tool organizer has a simple structure and easy to move. It comes with wrench, drywall anchors and pan head screws. It takes only a few minutes to install it, just need to drill holes and install screws. The installation guide is provided for you to check.
WIDE RANGE OF USES: Our power tool organizer wall mount is perfect to organize all kinds of garage stuff. And it’s widely used as screwdriver organizer, electric drill charging station and Father’s Day gift. It’s suitable for garage, tools room warehouse and so on due to its perfect size.
SATISFACTION SERVICE: Feel free to contact with us, if you have any problems of this drill holder wall mount. We will try our best to solve any problems for you within 24 hours. And we offer a 1-year guarantee on this product. Don’t worry about it.
